Member Function Documentation

Numbers_Words_es_AR.toWords ( $  num,
$  power = 0 
)

Converts a number to its word representation in Argentinian Spanish.

Parameters:
float $num An float between -infinity and infinity inclusive :) that should be converted to a words representation
integer $power The power of ten for the rest of the number to the right. For example toWords(12,3) should give "doce mil". Optional, defaults to 0.
Returns:
string The corresponding word representation
private
Author:
Martin Marrese

Reimplemented from Numbers_Words.

Numbers_Words_es_AR.toCurrencyWords ( $  int_curr,
$  decimal,
$  fraction = false,
$  convert_fraction = true 
)

Converts a currency value to its word representation (with monetary units) in Agentinian Spanish language

Parameters:
integer $int_curr An international currency symbol as defined by the ISO 4217 standard (three characters)
integer $decimal A money total amount without fraction part (e.g. amount of dollars)
integer $fraction Fractional part of the money amount (e.g. amount of cents) Optional. Defaults to false.
integer $convert_fraction Convert fraction to words (left as numeric if set to false). Optional. Defaults to true.
Returns:
string The corresponding word representation for the currency
public
Author:
Martin Marrese

        0 => array('',''),
